entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Cobourg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cobourg 12:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 7.8°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches overnight. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:45 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
